Header: Yovun Puraya will be held in Weerawila
Content: The Yovun Puraya -2019 program will be held in Weerawila next month. The initial discussion in this regard was held at the Prime Minister’s office under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe and Minister Sagala Ratnayake. Yovun Puraya program is a brainchild of Premier Ranil Wickremesinghe. This year’s program will be held at the Livestock Resources Development Board in Weerawila from the 27th to 31st of next month. The Yovun Puraya project aims to educate country’s youth on national reconciliation and co-existence. In addition a range of cultural and recreational activities has been organized. Chairman of the Youth Council, Eranda Weli-ange and heads of security forces were part of the discussion.
